about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate developer crafting <bold>digital experiences</bold> that make a difference. Let me tell you a bit about my journey and what drives me.

story.title: My Story
story.paragraph1: With over <bold>8 years of experience</bold> in web development, I've had the privilege of working with businesses from startups to established enterprises, helping them bring their digital visions to life.
story.paragraph2: My journey began with a curiosity about how websites work, which quickly evolved into a passion for creating <bold>exceptional digital experiences</bold>. I specialize in e-commerce solutions, but my interests span across modern web technologies, 3D experiences, and everything in between.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.paragraph1: I believe that great websites are more than just code—they're <bold>digital experiences</bold> that should delight users while achieving business goals. Every project is an opportunity to create something meaningful.
philosophy.paragraph2: Whether it's a complex e-commerce platform or a simple landing page, I approach each project with the same level of <bold>dedication, attention to detail</bold>, and commitment to excellence.

craftsmanship.title: Quality Craftsmanship
craftsmanship.description: Every line of code is written with purpose, every design decision is deliberate, and every user interaction is carefully considered.

passion.title: Genuine Passion
passion.description: I love what I do, and it shows in my work. Technology excites me, and I'm always eager to learn and experiment with new approaches.

collaboration.title: True Collaboration
collaboration.description: The best projects happen when client and developer work together as partners, sharing ideas and building something amazing together.

innovation.title: Forward Thinking
innovation.description: I stay current with emerging technologies and trends, always looking for ways to push boundaries and create cutting-edge solutions.

expertise.title: Technologies & Expertise
expertise.description: Specialized in <bold>modern web technologies</bold> and e-commerce solutions, delivering scalable and performant applications with a focus on user experience and business results.

projects.featuredDescription: A showcase of my recent work, spanning web applications, creative experiments, and open-source contributions.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Features include user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

taskmanager.title: Task Management App
taskmanager.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

weather.title: Weather Dashboard
weather.description: A responsive weather dashboard that displays current conditions and forecasts using external weather APIs with beautiful data visualizations.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A modern portfolio website built with React, Three.js, and Framer Motion featuring 3D animations and smooth scroll effects.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: Have a <bold>project in mind</bold>? I'd love to hear about it. Let's create something amazing together.
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing <bold>new opportunities</bold>, creative projects, or just having a chat about technology and development.
